titles.title: For the relief of Michael and Julie Schindler.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 10/17/2000--Introduced. Directs the Secretary to pay a specified sum to Michael and Julie Schindler of St. Bernard, Ohio, as compensation for the wrongful death of their son, Airman Basic Micha J. Schindler, during a military training activity.
